profile.name: Amitabh Sahu
profile.title: Software Developer
profile.about: Hi, I'm Amitabh Sahu. I enjoy creating end-to-end products, focusing on developing intuitive experiences that continuously improve based on metrics.

experience.title: Software Developer - SocialBoat
experience.desc: Collaborated with fellow developers to create a user-friendly web app and a hybrid mobile app, integrated GPT, and implemented progress tracking.
experience.stack: TypeScript • React Native • NextJS • Tailwind • Firebase

projects.title: Creative Clicks - Mobile App
projects.desc: Built a hybrid mobile app that allows users to capture photos, draw on them, add stickers, and download the edited images.

projects.title: Polling App - Full-Stack App
projects.desc: Published a full-stack polling app where users can create, delete and vote polls, and view results in real-time with auto-refresh every 5 seconds.

projects.title: Password Generator - CLI App
projects.desc: I've published a simple utility tool to generate passwords in the terminal.

projects.title: React List - React UI Package
projects.desc: Build and maintain a React package of a scrollable interface to render infinite lists with type support, including horizontal, inverted, and section options.
